thread.section_title: Gamecheap Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Gamecheap | gamecheap.net
thread.title: Darren Tansley

author: Darren Tansley
title: Darren Tansley
text: Really pleased with the communication and download of my Windows 10 OS. The price was excellent (so cheap I wanted to check that the company was legitimate first!) but after checking the reviews I took the plunge. A couple of attempts to download and install but this was at my end and nothing to do with Game Cheap. I suggest persistence if you're in a poor internet connection. Very pleased.
